Conclusions from FY2002 Evaluation of NIDCD’s R03 Program
Conclusions from FY2002
Evaluation of NIDCD’s R03 Program

➢ R03 funding comes at a critical career point at the end of the postdoctoral experience or beginning faculty appointment, and helps establish a research direction.
